title: Welcome: Jett Lawrence
excerpt: Jett Lawrence works on a back-up plan.
author: Lewis Phillips
content:
Subscribe to MX Vice on YouTube.

Follow @MXVice on Instagram.

Jett Lawrence is just a dream for a sponsor. Not only does he have a very bright future in the United States, he also has a personality that has attracted loyal support from fans across the globe. Yoshimura put the latter to good use in their latest clip, which shows Jett working in their shop in Southern California. There are plenty of laughs along the way. Sit back and have a bit of fun.

Video: Yoshimura R&D | Lead Image: Geico Honda
